title: Virginia Tech Football adds 27 players to 2022 roster - VT hokiesports.com
content: Virginia Tech Football adds 27 players to 2022 roster  VT hokiesports.com
description: Virginia Tech Football head coach Brent Pry welcomed three more players to the program on National Signing Day. These three additions give the Hokies a total of 23 signees in Pry's initial recruiting class at Tech after the team landed 19 new student-athletes during December's early signing period. Tech also signed four mid-year transfers, bringing the total of new scholarship players entering the program in 2022 up to a total of 26 student-athletes.
